16965894454872177.text: What is the minimum duration of a flight for booking a "Business" class ticket?
16965894454872177.node_text: Booking a "Business"  class ticket is allowed on flights which last more than 10 uninterrupted hours. Otherwise, only the cheapest flight class is reimbursable. A seat reservation is not reimbursable.

16965894454925144.text: How should you plan your business trip if you are traveling without your family?
16965894454925144.node_text:
Your business trip must be planned as though you were traveling alone (without your family). How doe that work? Provide receipts for only the costs associated with purchases for yourself 
 Collect comparison offers where necessary (e.g., transportation costs and accommodation) for what the costs would have been for only one person 
 Personal expenses must be strictly separated from business expenses 
 You are responsible for paying all additional costs that result from bringing your family along.

1696589445494294.text: What is the purpose of the A1 Form?
1696589445494294.node_text: For all  business trips (even for short trips or ones lasting only a single day) outside the country to EU-countries, Iceland, Norway, Liechtenstein or Switzerland, you will need to fill out an A1 Form , which must be brought with you when you leave the country. You will need to fill out a new A1 for each business trip you take. Filling the form out once, does not allow it to apply for subsequent trips you tak.

16965894454942985.text: Why do we need to fill out the A1 Form?
16965894454942985.node_text: For all  business trips (even for short trips or ones lasting only a single day) outside the country to EU-countries, Iceland, Norway, Liechtenstein or Switzerland, you will need to fill out an A1 Form , which must be brought with you when you leave the country. You will need to fill out a new A1 for each business trip you take. Filling the form out once, does not allow it to apply for subsequent trips you tak.

(To claim a passenger, they must also sign your travel reimbursement request.) If you are transporting business related items (e.g., files) weighing more than 50 Kg you are eligible for 2 Cent per 50 Kg and Kilometer. (Changes coming in 2022)

16965894454994662.text: What type of tests can be reimbursed for business reasons?
16965894454994662.node_text: PCR-Tests can be reimbursed, if they were required for business reasons (proof must be given of the necessity). Antigen tests can be reimbursed if, e.g., entrance to a business meeting or event is only allowed with proof of a negative test.
